did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Buckingham County (Va.) List and Bill of Property Sold, 1834

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Buckingham County (Va.) List and Bill of Property Sold, 1834. Local government records collection, Buckingham County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 37046.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Buckingham County was formed in 1761 from Albemarle County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Buckingham County (Va.) List and Bill of Property Sold, 1834. Consists of a list and receipt for property, mostly housewares, sold to Elizabeth Scrubbs from the estate of George Scruggs, deceased.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Buckingham County Court Records can be found on microfilm at The Library of Virginia. See http://www.lva.lib.va.us/whatwehave/local/local_rec/index.htm.
